test.sql: SELECT * FROM Employees e WHERE e.EmployeeID = ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID < ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID > ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID <> ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID <= ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID >= ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID + ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees) AND e.EmployeeID - ANY (SELECT EmployeeID FROM Employees)

expectedError.text: SOME, ANY and ALL can only be applied on =, <>, <, <=, >, or >=
SOME, ANY and ALL can only be applied on =, <>, <, <=, >, or >=
